section1.title: Discover New World with Neomi
section1.description: Enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience with comfort like home. From mountains to beaches, we're ready to accompany every step of your journey.

section2.title: Your Journey Begins Here
section2.description: Experience the perfect blend of adventure and comfort with our carefully curated travel packages. Let us make your dream vacation a reality.

section3.title: Our Services
section3.description: We provide a variety of the best services to support your comfort and convenience during your trip. Enjoy a safe, comfortable, and unforgettable travel experience with Neomi Tour and Travel.

transport.title: Tour Transportation
transport.desc: We provide comfortable and safe vehicles, complete with experienced drivers ready to take you anywhere.

homestay.title: Comfortable & Strategic Homestay
homestay.desc: We offer clean, comfortable accommodation in strategic locations near tourist attractions. Perfect for families, couples, or solo travelers.

package.title: Tour Packages
package.desc: We offer a variety of attractive tour packages that can be tailored to your needs and preferences.

custom.title: Custom Trip
custom.desc: Have your own destination? We are ready to create a travel package according to your wishes. More flexible and personal.

section4.title: Discover Tourist Destinations
section4.description: Explore amazing places with Neomi Tour and Travel. From cool mountains to stunning tropical beaches, we are ready to take you to your dream destination with the best and most comfortable service.

posts.title: 5 Must-Try Bakso Spots in Malang
posts.excerpt: Malang is known as a culinary city in East Java, and one of the most popular dishes is Malang meatballs.

posts.title: Hidden Beaches to Explore in Malang
posts.excerpt: Discover the beauty of Malang's hidden beaches that are still rarely visited by tourists.

posts.title: Exciting Hike to Mount Bromo
posts.excerpt: Experience hiking Mount Bromo and enjoy the breathtaking sunrise view.

posts.title: Best Night Culinary in Malang
posts.excerpt: Explore the best night culinary spots you must try when visiting Malang.

Footer.description: Enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience with comfort like home. From mountains to beaches, we are ready to accompany every step of your journey.
